r.name: genocide
r.effect: dealDamage(0.3*curHealth, 0, 0) damageChange(3x+32, 12x+180) critChange(x+10, 12x+180) lifestealChange(0.4, 12x+180) armorChange(-4x-30, 12x+180) mute(12x+180)

f.name: nigth_assault
f.effect: self.hypno(60) timer(self.resetOnBodyCollision, 60) onBodyCollision(self.clearhypno target.dealDamage(3x+30, 0, 2) target.armorChange(2x+18, 2.4x+60) target.accuracyChange(3x+18, 2.4x+60) self.resetOnBodyCollision)

r.name: rancorous_charge
r.effect: self.charge(-2) self.speedChange(30, -3) onBodyCollision(self.charge(0) self.resetspeed target.dealDamage(self.damage*(0.04x+1), 0, 1) target.stun(2.4x+60) target.push(60) self.resetOnBodyCollision)

r.name: rockbreaker
r.effect: self.push(40, self.spell.range.reach) onPushEnd(AOE(190, target.dealDamage(12x+80, 0, 2) target.disarm(4.8x+120)) self.resetOnBodyCollision) onBodyCollision(self.clearPush AOE(190, target.dealDamage(12x+80, 0, 2) target.disarm(4.8x+120)) self.resetOnBodyCollision)

e.name: subterrain_charge
e.effect: self.push(120) timer(self.resetOnBodyCollision, 120) onBodyCollision(self.clearpush target.dealDamage(7x+40, 0, 2) target.cripple(120) self.resetOnBodyCollision)

r.name: groundbreak
r.effect: self.push(40, self.spell.range.reach) onPushEnd(self.clearPush AOE(120, target.dealDamage(8x+45, 0, 2) target.stun(4.8x+60)) onBodyCollision(self.clearPush AOE(120, target.dealDamage(8x+45, 0, 2) target.stun(4.8x+60)) self.resetOnBodyCollision)
